title: (x) Bacardi Silver Mojito script - Gizmo {Mike Y}
content:
I was trying to hand-draw something in the style of the Bacardi Silver Mojito logo, but then I realized that the script is actually a font (the os are the same). Does anybody know what it is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317143025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BacSilverMojitoLogo4C_6209.jpg)
author: DrDoc

comments.content:
It is [Gizmo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317143025/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fw-g-type/gizmo/) by Nick Cooke, but it has been slanted.

- Mike Yanega
